heronarts.lx.transition
Class LXTransition

java.lang.Object
  heronarts.lx.control.LXParameterized
      heronarts.lx.transition.LXTransition
All Implemented Interfaces:
LXParameter.Listener
Direct Known Subclasses:
DissolveTransition, FadeTransition, IrisTransition, SlideTransition, WipeTransition
public abstract class LXTransition
extends LXParameterized

An object interface to blend two patterns together. All transitions have a duration and generate a new array of colors based upon a source pattern and a destination pattern. Transitions also support easing.

Nested Class Summary
static class LXTransition.Ease
          Constants for easing that should be applied to the transition.

blend

public final void blend(int[] c1,
                        int[] c2,
                        double progress)
Invoked by the Engine. After this method is called getColors() will return the blended colors.

Parameters:
c1 - Colors being blended from
c2 - Colors being blended to
progress - Progress of blend, from 0 to 1
